content: Hi! Im trying to do my checkoffs and Ive opened the website in a few browsers but it always says 502 bad gateway. Is it down?
subject: The website seems to be crashed

content: Yeah. Valid for trying in different browsers though. We love that.
still crashed. When do we estimate it'll be available again?
Is there any other way we can receive our check off or should we just wait for the website to come back online?
